entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
